outputs.output_descr: The project aims to strengthen the DPG Secretariat's overall capacity and align its structure and functions so as to provide greater advisory role to the DPG as well as coordination support at the sector level. The project also supports increased national capacity to manage aid effectively and lead and own aid harmonization and alignment process by providing direct aid coordination and management support to the Mainland and Zanzibar.

donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
